column1:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Sugar is sweet,
And so are you.
Twinkle, twinkle, little star,\nHow I wonder what you are!
The woods are lovely, dark and deep,\nBut I have promises to keep,\nAnd miles to go before I sleep.
In the forest, through the trees,\nA gentle breeze whispers the leaves.
